phrases: I was just about to have a good fight!
It was just big, and not much else.
But all's well and nothing could be better than that.
Thank you so much, traveling monk.
Our village has been tormented by that demon.
We shall have a feast for you to show our gratitude.
This was just part of my training.
The pretty girls of the village eagerly await you.
But if that is the case...
Well, since you are being so kind,
Buddha will punish me if I do not accept.
Changing his mind because of the young girls.
He really is a lecher priest.
It is been so long since we have had such great food!
You have not touched your food.
I can see in your palm that you will be blessed with children.
Miss, will you be army children?
I will have as many as you want.
Do not just sit there and watch!
Why do not you father two, even three children?
Old woman, you are always so healthy.
I still can bear a child or two!
Even in this age, they had lively family communions.
Oh, moms, dads and grandparents and siblings all dining together and
If you lie down right after eating, you will end up a cow!
I was a bit concerned about you, Inuyasha.
So I came... only to find you battling a giant centipede.
I am so glad you are okay.
When the fighting's on, you are nowhere to be found.
But you always appear at times like this.
Even an old one like me
has some secrets he would prefer to keep.
I have heard of child spirits lingering on
in an old mansion like this, but is that all this is?
What a way to be awakened.
You can go by yourself, cannot you?
Do you know what time it is?
She is come sneaking into my bed!
Do not tell me you are still angry about earlier?
The old woman was just joking!
You do not have to be so angry!
Cannot you be more quiet when you fight?
She slapped him before she came to.
There is no doubt that someone bewitched Sango.
I do not remember a thing.
I do not sense anything suspicious around here.
When did you hop onto Miroku?
Are you sure you do not sense anything suspicious?
I will bet you are hiding something!
Long ago, my father told me of demons who
realize their power for the first time after death.
For the first time after death?
The most recent demon we destroyed was...
Then that weak, giant centipede is the culprit?
Then we must make sure it is permanently sealed again.
In any case, let us seal it with a sutra charm.
Kagome, you do not have any luck with men.
Unless you leave your current fellow,
you will not find peace or happiness.
You are no better with men!
You would better forget about him.
He is too much of a womanizer.
Your palm-reading is right on the mark.
Are you done with sealing the demon?
So you have shown your true self!
I did not think you were such a man!
This time, the spirit of the centipede has possessed Miroku!
Miroku shows no signs of being possessed
I do not need to be told that!
If I cannot catch up to that little kid,
What is with that accent, Miroku?!
That is why I said he is possessed!
Are you the real Miroku now?
He has definitely returned to his old self, Inuyasha.
Could it be the mate of last night's centipede?
Is this the one who possessed us?
Let us put a sutra charm on it.
The way he is running... he looks like a flea.
Do not think you can escape from me.
You and I will get married.
I still have my own dreams!
I want to fall in love... and I want to declare my love!
It came out from Inuyasha's body.
This is my one wish of a lifetime!
It is the end of the line for you.
When a flea reaches my age,
she wants to settle down and have a family.
From long ago, he is been such a womanizer!
Whenever there is a pretty woman...
He goes to check on her without a word...
And he leaves without a trace.
So I came after him this time,
sworn to take him back even if I must carry him on my back!
You knew that this Old Shoga was the one who bewitched us!
Inuyasha, do you intend to steal my days of youth?!
I think I would better tie you to my back!
If you are going to take Old Myoga's freedom,
you should stay here and get married.
Then you can start a life together!
She may be a flea, but she is still a female.
We will ask the headman to be the go-between.
There is no need for the headman!
Myoga does not seem pleased about it.
Become a fine flea husband and wife.
Now we are married at last!
You can at least say you love me.
He switched places with some roving flea!
Run to the depths of Hell!
When it comes to running away, he is the best!
Cannot you find Naraku's castle yet?
This is the night of the new moon.
Is your sense of smell lost for this night?
It belongs to Koga of the Wolf-Demon Tribe.
Kagura is making a deal with Sesshomaru!
Next on Inuyasha: Naraku's Barrier... Kagura's Decision
